lyric:
[00:32.33]I see your monsters,
[00:34.88]I see your pain.
[00:37.79]Tell me your problems,
[00:39.93]I'll chase them away.
[00:43.80]I'll be your lighthouse.
[00:45.63]I'll make it okay.
[00:48.31]When I see your monsters
[00:51.60]I'll stand there so brave,
[00:53.00]and chase them all away.
[01:36.94]and chase them all away.
[01:58.80]and chase them all away.
[02:35.94]In the dark we, we, we,
[02:38.46]stand apart we, we,
[02:41.80]never see that the things we need are staring right at us.
[02:46.69]You just want to hide, hide,
[02:49.30]never show your smile, smile, smile.
[02:52.00]Stand alone when you need someone
[02:54.41]its the hardest thing of all
[02:56.17]that you see are the bad, bad, bad memories
[03:01.91]take your time, you'll find it.
[03:27.72]I see your monsters,
[03:30.38]I see your pain.
[03:33.13]Tell me your problems,
[03:35.63]I'll chase them away.
[03:38.66]I'll be your lighthouse.
[03:41.21]I'll make it okay.
[03:43.88]When I see your monsters
[03:46.67]I'll stand there so brave,
[03:48.69]and chase them all away.
[04:10.69]and chase them all away.
[04:32.60]and chase them all away.
[05:18.10]I see your monsters,
[05:20.14]I see your pain.
[05:22.79]Tell me your problems,
[05:25.33]I'll chase them away.
[05:28.38]I'll be your lighthouse.
[05:30.73]I'll make it okay.
[05:33.41]When I see your monsters
[05:36.29]I'll stand there so brave,
[05:38.11]and chase them all away.
tlyric:
[by:饥饿困兽]
[00:32.33]我发现了你内心里的怪物，
[00:34.88]我能感觉到你的痛苦。
[00:37.79]告诉我你的问题，
[00:39.93]我会将他们赶走。
[00:43.80]我将成为你的灯塔。
[00:45.63]让这事过去
[00:48.31]当我看到你的怪物
[00:51.60]我将站在那里，毫无畏惧
[00:53.00]并赶走他们。
[01:36.94]并赶走他们。
[01:58.80]并赶走他们。
[02:35.94]在黑暗中，我们
[02:38.46]变成了最熟悉的陌生人
[02:41.80]别想着碌碌无为可以无憾终生
[02:46.69]你只想藏起来，
[02:49.30]永远不要暴露你的。
[02:52.00]静候你需要的那个人
[02:54.41]最难的事情
[02:56.17]即想起残酷的回忆
[03:01.91]倾尽所有，真相即可大白。
[03:27.72]我发现了你内心里的怪物，
[03:30.38]我能感觉到你的痛苦。
[03:33.13]告诉我你的问题，
[03:35.63]我会把他们驱逐。
[03:38.66]我将成为你的灯塔。
[03:41.21]让这事过去
[03:43.88]当我看到你的怪物
[03:46.67]我将站在那里，毫无畏惧
[03:48.69]并赶走他们。
[04:10.69]并赶走他们。
[04:32.60]并赶走他们。
[05:18.10]我发现了你内心里的怪物，
[05:20.14]我能感觉到你的痛苦。
[05:22.79]告诉我你的问题，
[05:25.33]我会把他们赶走。
[05:28.38]我将成为你的灯塔。
[05:30.73]让这事过去
[05:33.41]当我发现了你内心里的怪物
[05:36.29]我将站在那里，毫无畏惧
[05:38.11]并赶走他们。
